original_text: While he was saying this to me, I bowed with my face toward the ground and was speechless.
korean_text: 그가 이런 말로 내게 이를 때에 내가 곧 얼굴을 땅에 향하고 말문이 막혔더니

sentences.original_text: While he was saying this to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 나에게 이것을 말하고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: I bowed with my face toward the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 얼굴을 땅으로 향하게 하고 절했습니다
